mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guest(num, userId, content, reg_date) VALUES (guest_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{content}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT g.num, g.userId, m.userName, g.content, g.reg_date FROM guest g JOIN member1 m ON g.userId = m.userId ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
